quiz.question: _____ replica
quiz.explanation: 复制品，精确的复制品。The museum displayed an exact replica of the ancient artifact. 博物馆展出了古代文物的精确的复制品。

quiz.question: _______ armada
quiz.explanation: 舰队，西班牙舰队。The Spanish armada sailed against England in 1588. 西班牙舰队在1588年向英格兰进发。

quiz.question: _______ agenda
quiz.explanation: 议程，会议议程。The secretary prepared the meeting agenda for discussion. 秘书准备了讨论的会议议程。

quiz.question: _____ coda
quiz.explanation: 尾声，音乐尾声。The symphony ended with a beautiful music coda. 交响乐以美妙的音乐尾声结束。

quiz.question: _________ panacea
quiz.explanation: 万能药，万能的万能药。There is no universal panacea for all of life's problems. 没有万能的万能药能解决生活中的所有问题。

quiz.question: ______ saga
quiz.explanation: 传奇故事，家族传奇故事。The novel told a long family saga spanning generations. 这部小说讲述了一个跨越几代人的漫长家族传奇故事。

quiz.question: ________ apocrypha
quiz.explanation: 伪经，圣经伪经。Scholars debate the authenticity of biblical apocrypha. 学者们争论圣经伪经的真实性。

quiz.question: ______ phobia
quiz.explanation: 恐惧症，社交恐惧症。She struggled with social phobia in crowded places. 她在拥挤的地方与社交恐惧症作斗争。

quiz.question: ____ acrophobia
quiz.explanation: 恐高症，患有恐高症。People who have acrophobia fear heights intensely. 患有恐高症的人非常害怕高度。

quiz.question: fascia _____
quiz.explanation: 筋膜板，筋膜板。The carpenter installed the fascia board under the roof edge. 木匠在屋顶边缘下安装了筋膜板。

quiz.question: ______ encyclopedia
quiz.explanation: 百科全书，袖珍百科全书。She carried a pocket encyclopedia for quick reference. 她随身携带袖珍百科全书以便快速查阅。

quiz.question: _____ nostalgia
quiz.explanation: 怀旧，甜蜜的怀旧。He felt sweet nostalgia when visiting his childhood home. 他访问童年住所时感到甜蜜的怀旧。

quiz.question: hemophilia _______
quiz.explanation: 血友病，血友病携带者。She was a hemophilia carrier but showed no symptoms. 她是血友病携带者，但没有表现出症状。

quiz.question: ____-__________ anemia
quiz.explanation: 贫血，缺铁性贫血。The doctor diagnosed iron-deficiency anemia and prescribed supplements. 医生诊断为缺铁性贫血并开了补充剂。

quiz.question: ________ mania
quiz.explanation: 狂热，足球狂热。During the World Cup, football mania swept the nation. 世界杯期间，足球狂热席卷全国。

quiz.question: _________ megalomania
quiz.explanation: 自大狂，政治自大狂。The dictator's political megalomania knew no bounds. 独裁者的政治自大狂没有界限。

quiz.question: monomania ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 偏执狂，对秩序的偏执狂。His monomania for order made him organize everything obsessively. 他对秩序的偏执狂让他强迫性地整理一切。

quiz.question: pyromania ____
quiz.explanation: 纵火狂，纵火狂案例。The psychiatrist studied the pyromania case carefully. 精神病医生仔细研究了纵火狂案例。

quiz.question: _______ dipsomania
quiz.explanation: 酗酒狂，酒精酗酒狂。His alcohol dipsomania required professional treatment. 他的酒精酗酒狂需要专业治疗。

quiz.question: gardenia _______
quiz.explanation: 栀子花，栀子花花朵。The fragrant gardenia blossom filled the garden with perfume. 芳香的栀子花花朵让花园充满香气。

quiz.question: ________ insignia
quiz.explanation: 徽章，军事徽章。The officer wore military insignia on his uniform. 军官在制服上佩戴军事徽章。

quiz.question: ______ insomnia
quiz.explanation: 失眠，遭受失眠。Many people suffer insomnia due to stress. 许多人因压力而遭受失眠。

quiz.question: paranoia ________
quiz.explanation: 偏执症，偏执症障碍。The patient was diagnosed with paranoia disorder. 患者被诊断患有偏执症障碍。

quiz.question: cornucopia __ _______
quiz.explanation: 丰饶，选择的丰饶。The buffet offered a cornucopia of options for diners. 自助餐为食客提供了选择的丰饶。

quiz.question: _____ utopia
quiz.explanation: 乌托邦，理想的乌托邦。The philosopher described his vision of an ideal utopia. 哲学家描述了他对理想的乌托邦的愿景。

quiz.question: _________ myopia
quiz.explanation: 短视，营销短视。The company suffered from marketing myopia and lost customers. 公司遭受营销短视并失去了客户。

quiz.question: _____ aria
quiz.explanation: 咏叹调，歌剧咏叹调。The soprano sang a beautiful opera aria. 女高音唱了一首美妙的歌剧咏叹调。

quiz.question: _______ bacteria
quiz.explanation: 细菌，有害的细菌。Washing hands removes harmful bacteria. 洗手可以去除有害的细菌。

quiz.question: ____ __ euphoria
quiz.explanation: 欣快感，欣快感的浪潮。The victory brought a wave of euphoria to the fans. 胜利给球迷带来了欣快感的浪潮。

quiz.question: __________ fantasia
quiz.explanation: 幻想曲，管弦乐幻想曲。The composer wrote an elaborate orchestral fantasia. 作曲家创作了一首精心制作的管弦乐幻想曲。

quiz.question: _____ analgesia
quiz.explanation: 镇痛，局部镇痛。The dentist applied local analgesia before the procedure. 牙医在手术前进行了局部镇痛。

quiz.question: _________ amnesia
quiz.explanation: 失忆症，暂时性失忆症。After the accident, he suffered temporary amnesia. 事故后，他患上了暂时性失忆症。

quiz.question: _____ militia
quiz.explanation: 民兵，地方民兵。The local militia defended the village. 地方民兵保卫了村庄。

quiz.question: _________ inertia
quiz.explanation: 惯性，牛顿惯性。Physics students study Newtonian inertia. 物理学生学习牛顿惯性。

quiz.question: _______ minutia
quiz.explanation: 细节，琐碎的细节。Don't get lost in trivial minutia; focus on the big picture. 不要迷失在琐碎的细节中；关注大局。

quiz.question: _______ trivia
quiz.explanation: 琐事，无用的琐事。His head was full of useless trivia. 他的脑子里充满了无用的琐事。

quiz.question: dyslexia _________
quiz.explanation: 阅读障碍，阅读障碍诊断。Early dyslexia diagnosis can help with treatment. 早期阅读障碍诊断可以帮助治疗。

quiz.question: anorexia _______
quiz.explanation: 厌食症，神经性厌食症。She received treatment for anorexia nervosa. 她接受了神经性厌食症的治疗。

quiz.question: asphyxia _____
quiz.explanation: 窒息，窒息死亡。The autopsy revealed asphyxia death as the cause. 尸检显示窒息死亡是死因。

quiz.question: ___-_____ parka
quiz.explanation: 派克大衣，毛皮内衬派克大衣。She wore a warm fur-lined parka in the Arctic. 她在北极穿着温暖的毛皮内衬派克大衣。

quiz.question: _______ sequela
quiz.explanation: 后遗症，疾病后遗症。The disease sequela affected him for years. 疾病后遗症影响了他多年。

quiz.question: ________ gorilla
quiz.explanation: 大猩猩，山地大猩猩。The mountain gorilla is an endangered species. 山地大猩猩是濒危物种。

quiz.question: parabola _____
quiz.explanation: 抛物线，抛物线曲线。The mathematics teacher explained the parabola curve. 数学老师解释了抛物线曲线。

quiz.question: ________ formula
quiz.explanation: 公式，化学公式。The chemist wrote the chemical formula on the board. 化学家在黑板上写下化学公式。

quiz.question: _______ peninsula
quiz.explanation: 半岛，伊比利亚半岛。Spain and Portugal are located on the Iberian peninsula. 西班牙和葡萄牙位于伊比利亚半岛上。

quiz.question: _______ spatula
quiz.explanation: 铲子，厨房铲子。She used a kitchen spatula to flip the pancakes. 她用厨房铲子翻煎饼。

quiz.question: ______ melodrama
quiz.explanation: 情节剧，家庭情节剧。The TV show was a typical family melodrama. 这个电视节目是典型的家庭情节剧。

quiz.question: ________ panorama
quiz.explanation: 全景，山景全景。The lookout offered a breathtaking mountain panorama. 瞭望台提供了令人惊叹的山景全景。

quiz.question: _____ anathema
quiz.explanation: 诅咒，彻底的诅咒。Such behavior was utter anathema to their beliefs. 这种行为对他们的信仰来说是彻底的诅咒。

quiz.question: _________ dogma
quiz.explanation: 教条，宗教教条。The sect followed strict religious dogma. 这个教派遵循严格的宗教教条。

quiz.question: asthma ______
quiz.explanation: 哮喘，哮喘发作。She carried an inhaler in case of an asthma attack. 她随身携带吸入器以防哮喘发作。

quiz.question: _____ dilemma
quiz.explanation: 困境，道德困境。The doctor faced a difficult moral dilemma. 医生面临着困难的道德困境。

quiz.question: ______ comma
quiz.explanation: 逗号，牛津逗号。Writers debate whether to use the Oxford comma. 作家们争论是否使用牛津逗号。

quiz.question: ____ ____ coma
quiz.explanation: 昏迷，陷入昏迷。The patient would fall into coma after the accident. 患者会在事故后陷入昏迷。

quiz.question: ____ aroma
quiz.explanation: 香味，浓郁的香味。The coffee had a rich aroma that filled the room. 咖啡有浓郁的香味弥漫整个房间。

quiz.question: _____ miasma
quiz.explanation: 瘴气，有毒的瘴气。A toxic miasma rose from the swamp. 有毒的瘴气从沼泽升起。

quiz.question: ________ charisma
quiz.explanation: 魅力，磁性的魅力。The leader had magnetic charisma that attracted followers. 领导者有磁性的魅力吸引追随者。

quiz.question: _______ phenomena
quiz.explanation: 现象，自然现象。Scientists study natural phenomena to understand the world. 科学家研究自然现象以了解世界。

quiz.question: _____ _ subpoena
quiz.explanation: 传票，送达传票。The court officer would serve a subpoena to the witness. 法庭官员会向证人送达传票。

quiz.question: ______ ballerina
quiz.explanation: 芭蕾舞女演员，芭蕾舞女演员。The graceful ballet ballerina performed beautifully. 优雅的芭蕾舞女演员表演得很美。

quiz.question: _____ patina
quiz.explanation: 铜绿，绿色铜绿。The old bronze statue had a green patina. 旧青铜雕像有绿色铜绿。

quiz.question: __ antenna
quiz.explanation: 天线，电视天线。They adjusted the TV antenna to improve reception. 他们调整电视天线以改善接收。

quiz.question: penumbra __ _____
quiz.explanation: 半影，疑云的半影。A penumbra of doubt surrounded the decision. 疑云的半影笼罩着这个决定。

quiz.question: ______ tundra
quiz.explanation: 苔原，冰冻的苔原。The Arctic frozen tundra is a harsh environment. 北极冰冻的苔原是严酷的环境。

quiz.question: ____ chimera
quiz.explanation: 幻想，狂野的幻想。His plan was just a wild chimera with no basis in reality. 他的计划只是没有现实基础的狂野的幻想。

quiz.question: _ plethora __
quiz.explanation: 过剩，过剩的。The store offered a plethora of choices. 商店提供了过剩的选择。

quiz.question: ______ flora
quiz.explanation: 植物群，高山植物群。Botanists study the unique alpine flora. 植物学家研究独特的高山植物群。

quiz.question: ________ orchestra
quiz.explanation: 管弦乐队，交响乐团。The symphony orchestra performed Beethoven. 交响乐团演奏了贝多芬的作品。

quiz.question: bravura ___________
quiz.explanation: 华丽的技巧，华丽的技巧表演。The pianist gave a bravura performance. 钢琴家进行了华丽的技巧表演。

quiz.question: ______ mesa
quiz.explanation: 平顶山，沙漠平顶山。The desert mesa rose dramatically from the plain. 沙漠平顶山从平原上戏剧性地升起。

quiz.question: _____ sonata
quiz.explanation: 奏鸣曲，钢琴奏鸣曲。She practiced the piano sonata for hours. 她练习钢琴奏鸣曲好几个小时。

quiz.question: ____ cantata
quiz.explanation: 康塔塔，巴赫康塔塔。The choir performed a Bach cantata at the church. 合唱团在教堂演唱了巴赫康塔塔。

quiz.question: _____ delta
quiz.explanation: 三角洲，河流三角洲。The Nile river delta is extremely fertile. 尼罗河河流三角洲极其肥沃。

quiz.question: magenta _____
quiz.explanation: 品红色，品红色连衣裙。She wore a bright magenta dress to the party. 她穿着鲜艳的品红色连衣裙去参加派对。

quiz.question: ___ __ iota
quiz.explanation: 一点点，一点都没有。There is not an iota of truth in his story. 他的故事中一点都没有真实性。

quiz.question: _____ quota
quiz.explanation: 配额，销售配额。The salesman exceeded his sales quota this month. 销售员这个月超额完成了销售配额。

quiz.question: aorta ________
quiz.explanation: 主动脉，主动脉动脉瘤。The surgeon repaired the dangerous aorta aneurysm. 外科医生修复了危险的主动脉动脉瘤。

quiz.question: vista _____
quiz.explanation: 远景，远景点。The hiking trail offered a beautiful vista point. 徒步小径提供了美丽的远景点。

quiz.question: _____ operetta
quiz.explanation: 轻歌剧，喜剧轻歌剧。The theater staged a delightful comic operetta. 剧院上演了令人愉快的喜剧轻歌剧。

quiz.question: ______ lava
quiz.explanation: 熔岩，熔融的熔岩。Molten lava flowed down the volcano's sides. 熔融的熔岩从火山的侧面流下。

quiz.question: _______ nova
quiz.explanation: 新星，恒星新星。Astronomers observed a bright stellar nova. 天文学家观察到一颗明亮的恒星新星。

quiz.question: _______ supernova
quiz.explanation: 超新星，恒星超新星。The stellar supernova was visible from Earth. 恒星超新星从地球上可见。

quiz.question: ________ larva
quiz.explanation: 幼虫，蚊子幼虫。The mosquito larva develops in standing water. 蚊子幼虫在死水中发育。

quiz.question: ____ stanza
quiz.explanation: 诗节，诗歌诗节。The poem stanza contained four lines. 诗歌诗节包含四行。

quiz.question: _____ piazza
quiz.explanation: 广场，阳光明媚的广场。Tourists gathered in the sunny piazza. 游客们聚集在阳光明媚的广场上。

quiz.question: scab _____
quiz.explanation: 痂，伤口痂。Don't pick at the scab wound or it will scar. 不要抠伤口痂，否则会留疤。

quiz.question: _____ slab
quiz.explanation: 厚板，石头厚板。The workers lifted the heavy stone slab. 工人们抬起沉重的石头厚板。

quiz.question: drab _____
quiz.explanation: 单调的，单调的颜色。The room was painted in drab color. 房间涂着单调的颜色。

quiz.question: stab _____
quiz.explanation: 刺伤，刺伤伤口。The victim suffered a stab wound to the chest. 受害者胸部遭受刺伤伤口。

quiz.question: adlib ______
quiz.explanation: 即兴，即兴演讲。The speaker gave an impressive adlib speech. 演讲者进行了令人印象深刻的即兴演讲。

quiz.question: glib ______
quiz.explanation: 油嘴滑舌的，油嘴滑舌的回答。His glib answer didn't convince anyone. 他油嘴滑舌的回答没有说服任何人。

quiz.question: ___ nib
quiz.explanation: 笔尖，钢笔笔尖。The fountain pen nib needed to be replaced. 钢笔笔尖需要更换。

quiz.question: ____ jamb
quiz.explanation: 门框，门框。The carpenter measured the door jamb carefully. 木匠仔细测量了门框。

quiz.question: _____ limb
quiz.explanation: 肢体，上肢。The physical therapist examined the upper limb. 物理治疗师检查了上肢。

quiz.question: ____ aplomb
quiz.explanation: 沉着，冷静的沉着。She handled the crisis with cool aplomb. 她以冷静的沉着处理了危机。

quiz.question: succumb __ _______
quiz.explanation: 屈服，屈服于疾病。The elderly man would succumb to illness after a long battle. 老人在长期斗争后会屈服于疾病。

quiz.question: numb _______
quiz.explanation: 麻木的，麻木的手指。The cold made her numb fingers unable to move. 寒冷让她麻木的手指无法移动。

quiz.question: ____ cob
quiz.explanation: 玉米棒，玉米棒。They roasted corn cob over the fire. 他们在火上烤玉米棒。

quiz.question: snob ______
quiz.explanation: 势利，势利吸引力。The luxury brand has snob appeal. 这个奢侈品牌有势利吸引力。

quiz.question: barb __ _______
quiz.explanation: 倒钩，讽刺的倒钩。His comment had a sharp barb of sarcasm. 他的评论有尖锐的讽刺的倒钩。
